titleStmt.title: Daemonologie in forme of a dialogue, diuided into three bookes.
titleStmt.author: James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue printer to the Kings Majestie,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: Iames Rx., i.e. James I.
Headpieces, initials; device below title on t.p. may be a variant of royal arms.

The title page comes in at least three variants combining these characteristics: headpiece has vase or lace; second line begins with swash or regular G. Both copies at reel 239:13 and 239:14 have lace headpiece and swash.
Reproduction of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
